items.title: Trump’s Triumphal Arch Is An Important Rebellion Against Postmodern Thought
items.description: The greatness of neoclassical art and architecture lies not merely in historical memory but in truth. And that's why modernists hate it.

items.title: Why Are So Many Nurses Wishing Harm To Their Political Opponents?
items.description: Too many Americans cleave to the idea that if someone works in caregiving, they must be trustworthy.

items.title: Congress Could Fix The Entitlement Fraud Problem Overnight But Won’t
items.description: The current major problems of federal budget pressures and health care affordability for all consumers require action.

items.title: New Mexico And Utah Target ‘Homewrecker’ Laws That Protect Cheaters’ Spouses And Kids
items.description: If the Utah legislation succeeds, which it’s on track to do, that will leave only four states with alienation of affection laws on the books.

items.title: Valley Forge Park Preserves A Crucible Of The American Revolution
items.description: Valley Forge is a testament to the dedication of the thousands who sacrificed themselves for liberty, their homeland, and their posterity.
